Software focus on purely # Bitcoin fee estimation fails to capture highly relevant economic externalities (or: dumb sw skews markets).
Collective wallet behavior is too focused on in-blockchain # bitcoin fee paid, and results in fees that ramp up quickly, deflate slowly.
Broken wallet fee behavior on days with volatile # bitcoin price makes this readily apparent: Pay way more when FX price spikes.
100% of the # bitcoin wallets on the market fail to act in an economically rational manner, re transaction fees, on behalf of their users.
